e1.name: Culture
e1.desc: A lot of cyber-related stuff such as well-know threats to increase your knowledge about cybersecurity.

e1.name: Tools
e1.desc: A list of tools that you may use  while practicing cybersecurity.

e1.name: Handful resources
e1.desc: A list of useful resources (ex: website, gits...) that you may use while learning, or practicing cybersecurity.

Attacks.name: Server exploits
Attacks.desc: Some knowledge related to how hackers can exploit your server, along with notes to prevent such things.

Attacks.name: Website exploits
Attacks.desc: Some knowledge related to how hackers can exploit your website, along with notes to prevent such things.

Attacks.name: Database exploits
Attacks.desc: Some knowledge related to how hackers can exploit your database, along with notes to prevent such things.

Attacks.name: Reverse Engineering
Attacks.desc: Try to analyse, and exploit programs by accessing the underlying code, which can help finding database credential, or stuff like that.

Attacks.name: Remote Access
Attacks.desc: This is some knowledge related to what attackers are doing once they have access to a remote shell.

Cryptography.name: Crypto (basics)
Cryptography.desc: A lot of mathematical foundations allowing one's to understand more easily cryptographic algorithms.

Cryptography.name: Crypto (algorithms)
Cryptography.desc: Cryptography is the knowledge related to the encryption and decryption of messages.
